pages.text: 茄子種子可以割草獲得。
成熟之後收割的茄子可以直接吃，也可以用作其他料理的食材！
pages.title: 茄子作物
Cooked Aubergine
pages.text: Once cooked and with the seeds removed, further additions can be made to the aubergine to make it even tastier!

pages.title: Stuffed Aubergine
pages.text: A great vegetarian delicacy, the aubergine is combined with beets, carrots & potatoes for a truly magnificent meal!
